dict.acceptation: 焦虑，忧虑；切望，渴望；令人焦虑的事；挂念；

sent.orig: In this study, anxiety is categorized into trait anxiety and state anxiety.
sent.trans: 焦虑感在本研究中被分为性格焦虑和状态焦虑。

sent.orig: The brains automatic reaction to an anxiety-provoking situation also can fuel an anxiety disorder.
sent.trans: 大脑对激发焦虑的境遇所产生的自动反应也能成为焦虑症的助燃剂。

sent.orig: While they have not got their aims, their anxiety is how to get them; when they have got them, their anxiety is lest they should lose them.
sent.trans: 其未得之也，患得之；既得之，患失之。

sent.orig: Method: 40 cases had received in questionaire about anxiety through self analysis of anxiety statistics(SAS) .
sent.trans: 方法：对40例患者采用焦虑自评量表(SAS)进行焦虑方面的问卷调查。

sent.orig: It's strange that his anxiety always associated with eroticism of body. It's the anxiety of eroticism.
sent.trans: 令人奇怪的是，他的焦虑，是与身体的色情联系在一起的，是色情的焦虑。
